text: Tevha (he paigambara!) Tumhi ase dhairya rakha, jase dhairya drdhasankalpa ani sahasa balaganarya paigambaranni rakhale, ani tyancyasathi (siksa maganyata) gha'i karu naka. He jya divasi to azaba pahuna ghetila jyaca vayada tyanna dila jata ahe, tevha (tyanna he janavu lagela ki) divasaci eka ghatika matra (te jagata) rahile hote. He ahe sandesa pohacavine. Duracari lokankherija koni nasta kela janara nahi
